lead_paragraph: Spain scored four unanswered goals to defeat the United States, 8-4, on the opening day of the FIFA Beach Soccer World Cup in Rio de Janeiro. Jevin Albuquerque and Mario Chimienti scored 34 seconds apart to tie the score. Spain added four goals in a little more than three minutes.
